dhtmlxDataProcessor Guide and Samples

What is dhtmlxDataProcessor

dhtmlxDataProcessor is an addition to dhtmlxGrid/TreeGrid/Tree components, which is charged with loading data from server, sending updated content back to server, react to user actions (edit/add/delete elements, including possibility to verify entered values). It also expects some response from server on what was sent upon update/add/delete in order to complete the action on client side.

As far as request and response formats are unified, you can use any server side technology/language for back-end processing.

Main features
  • Full control with JavaScript API
  • AJAX support
  • User defined verificators
  • GET/POST methods
  • Any server side technology/language

    • Supported browsers

    dhtmlxDataProcessor developed using pure Javascript.
    Guaranteed compatibility:
  • IE 5.5 and above
  • FireFox 1.x and above
  • Safari 2.x and above
  • Opera 9.x
